title: Dances with Wolves
oscars_won_details: Best Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: Lieutenant John Dunbar, exiled to a remote western Civil War outpost, befriends wolves and the local Lakota tribe, making him an intolerable aberration in the military.

title: Goodfellas
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role (Joe Pesci)
description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

title: Ghost
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role (Whoopi Goldberg)
Best Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: After a young man is murdered, his spirit stays behind to warn his lover of impending danger, with the help of a reluctant psychic.

title: Home Alone
description: An eight-year-old troublemaker must protect his house from a pair of burglars when he is accidentally left home alone by his family during Christmas vacation.

title: Pretty Woman
description: A man in a legal but hurtful business needs an escort for some social events, and hires a beautiful prostitute he meets... only to fall in love.

title: Misery
description: After a famous author is rescued from a car crash by a fan of his novels, he comes to realize that the care he is receiving is only the beginning of a nightmare of captivity and abuse.

title: The Hunt for Red October
description: In November 1984, the Soviet Union's best submarine captain in their newest sub violates orders and heads for the U.S. Is he trying to defect or to start a war?

title: Edward Scissorhands
description: An artificial man, who was incompletely constructed and has scissors for hands, leads a solitary life. Then one day, a suburban lady meets him and introduces him to her world.

title: Total Recall
description: When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real.

title: The Godfather Part III
description: Follows Michael Corleone, now in his 60s, as he seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

title: Miller's Crossing
description: Tom Reagan, an advisor to a Prohibition-era crime boss, tries to keep the peace between warring mobs but gets caught in divided loyalties.

title: Die Hard 2
description: John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.

title: Back to the Future Part III
description: Stranded in 1955, Marty McFly receives word that his friend Doctor Emmett Brown is trapped in 1885 and must travel back in time to save him.

title: Awakenings
description: The victims of an encephalitis epidemic many years ago have been catatonic ever since, but a new drug offers the prospect of reviving them.

title: Reversal of Fortune
description: Claus von Bülow is convicted of attempting to murder his wife Sunny, but he hires law professor Alan Dershowitz to lead his appeal.

title: Dick Tracy
description: The comic strip detective finds his life vastly complicated when Breathless Mahoney makes advances towards him while he is trying to battle Big Boy Caprice's united mob.

title: Kindergarten Cop
description: A tough police detective must go undercover as a kindergarten teacher to locate the wife and child of a drug dealer.

title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
description: Four teenage mutant ninja turtles emerge from the shadows to protect New York City from a gang of criminal ninjas.

title: Tremors
description: Natives of a small isolated town defend themselves against strange underground creatures which are killing them one by one.

title: Wild at Heart
description: Young lovers Sailor and Lula run from the variety of weirdos that Lula's mom has hired to kill Sailor.

title: La Femme Nikita
description: Convicted felon Nikita, instead of going to jail, is given a new identity and trained, stylishly, as a top secret spy/assassin.

title: King of New York
description: A drug kingpin is released from prison and seeks to take total control of the criminal underworld in order to give back to the community.

title: Jacob's Ladder
description: Mourning his dead child, a haunted Vietnam War veteran attempts to uncover his past while suffering from severe dissociation. To do so, he must decipher reality and life from his own dreams, delusions, and perceptions of death.

title: The Grifters
description: A small-time con artist has torn loyalties between his estranged mother and his new girlfriend, both of whom are high-stakes grifters with their own angles to play.

title: Cyrano de Bergerac
description: A romantic poet with an abnormally large nose believes he is too ugly to be loved by the beautiful Roxane, so he helps a handsome young cadet woo her instead.

title: Darkman
description: A brilliant scientist left for dead returns to exact revenge on the people who burned him alive.

title: Gremlins 2: The New Batch
description: The Gremlins are back, and this time, they've taken control of a New York City media mogul's high-tech skyscraper.

title: Arachnophobia
description: A species of South American killer spider hitches a lift to the U.S. in a coffin and starts to breed and kill.

title: Presumed Innocent
description: As a lawyer investigates the murder of a colleague, he finds himself accused of the crime.

title: Days of Thunder
description: A young hot-shot stock car driver gets his chance to compete at the top level.

title: House Party
description: A high schooler sneaks out to his friend's house party for a night of fun, music, and romance, while trying to avoid his father and the school bullies.

title: Metropolitan
description: A group of young upper-class Manhattanites are blithely moving through the gala debutante season as an unusual outsider joins them.

title: Close-Up
description: The true story of a man who impersonated film director Mohsen Makhmalbaf, convincing a family he would star them in his new movie.

title: The Rescuers Down Under
description: The R.A.S. agents, Miss Bianca and Bernard, race to Australia to save a little boy and a rare golden eagle from a murderous poacher.

title: Joe Versus the Volcano
description: A hypochondriac learns he is dying and accepts an offer to throw himself into a volcano on a tropical island, and along the way learns to truly live.

title: Cry-Baby
description: A bad boy with a heart of gold wins the love of a good girl, whose boyfriend sets out to destroy him and his reputation.

title: Internal Affairs
description: An Internal Affairs agent becomes obsessed with bringing down a manipulative and corrupt cop who has everyone else fooled.

title: Pump Up the Volume
description: A high school student opens his own pirate radio station, but his broadcasts of teenage rebellion cause a stir in his small town.

title: Mo' Better Blues
description: The story of Bleek Gilliam, a talented jazz trumpeter who must make a series of difficult decisions that will affect his music, his love life, and his future.

title: Alice
description: A spoiled Manhattan housewife re-evaluates her life after visiting a Chinese herbalist who gives her herbs that make her invisible.

title: Hamlet
description: Prince Hamlet struggles with whether or not he should kill his uncle, whom he suspects has murdered his father, the former King.

title: Flatliners
description: Five medical students experiment with 'near death' experiences that involve chemically induced heart stoppages and immediate revival.
